10
11#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/block_buffer.h"
12
13#include <algorithm>
14
15namespace webrtc {
16
17BlockBuffer::BlockBuffer(size_t size,
18 size_t num_bands,
19 size_t num_channels,
20 size_t frame_length)
21 : size(static_cast<int>(size)),
22 buffer(size,
23 std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<float>>>(
24 num_bands,
25 std::vector<std::vector<float>>(
26 num_channels,
27 std::vector<float>(frame_length, 0.f)))) {
28 for (auto& block : buffer) {
29 for (auto& band : block) {
30 for (auto& channel : band) {
31 std::fill(channel.begin(), channel.end(), 0.f);
32 }
33 }
34 }
35}
36
37BlockBuffer::~BlockBuffer() = default;
38
39} // namespace webrtc
40
